description:
This pair of panniers is a stripped-down version of the Ortlieb Classic Back-Roller. The simpler design has just what you need for everyday use, and retains the durability and reliability that makes the classic version so trusted. The waterproof fabric and roll-top closure seal out rain and splashes, so they keep your change of clothes dry on your bike commute to work or school.

  • PVC-coated polyester and PU-coated nylon is completely waterproof
  • QL1 fixing system is simple to use
  • IP64 waterproof rating means these are perfect for rainy weather
  • Can be used with rack with tubes 16, 11, and 8mm in diameter
  • 3M Scotchlite reflective patch keeps you visible
  • Edge protector prevent premature wear
  • Capacity is 20L per pannier. Max load is 9kg per pannier
  • Sold as a pair
name: Ortlieb Back-Roller City Panniers
